page.title: 11UPPER RATLAKE FARM,AMPFIELD
page.content: Upper Ratlake farm, as the name implies is in North Ratlake between the villages of Ampfield and Hursley. {Cattle farming}is carried out there. The farm is owned by Mr. Cooper but he is away in Monaco.Mr. Hillier rents the farm and buildings. Altogether there are 161 acres and includes barns and a farmhouse which is quite large and was built in 1957. There are no crops at all on the farm but{beef cattle}are bred to be fattened and then sold for meat.Mr. Hillier's day starts at 6.00am. and ends at approximately 9.00pm. depending on the time of year. It is mainly grassland for the cows to eat, and from the{farmhouse}the area appears fairly flat with few trees and hedges.
